Key Match Events: DJ Herz spun a no-hitter through four innings tonight
Isaac Paredes broke up the no-hitter to open up the 5th
Pre-Game Insights: Brett Taylor didn't feel particularly fatalistic about the Cubs, thinking they could come back and win the game despite a 2-run deficit
Post-Match Reflections: The Cubs got three runs before DJ Herz departed, and ultimately scored another that was charged to Herz
Javier Assad posted a Quality Start
Miscellaneous Highlights: Nico Hoerner had a couple hits and scored a couple runs
Tyson Miller bounced back from a previous game
Jorge Lopez was healthy and back on the mound
Others: The Cubs are going to need Jorge Lopez if they're going to make a run
The Ankin Law "Making it Personal" Player of the Game honors were given to Nico Hoerner
